Articles.Content:
after remembering that a certain modder named DSSP had attempted to create animations that allowed kerbals to operate equipment in EVAs, i realized i should try to bring this information back to light since it has been buried for months due to abandonment by DSSP and his eventual disappearance...

his threads on the matter:

science rack

work shop

example of how he created the animations

eva animations

i lack experience and thus can't do this myself although i should mention that the whole point of me posting this is so someone can pick this up and hopefully make something great from this....
